skillTree.name: Steed of Slaanesh
skillTree.description: Steeds have long, sinuous bodies that writhe ceaselessly as they dash towards the foe.

skillTree.name: Seeker Chariot
skillTree.description: Straining steeds urge the chariot to full speed, where swirling shapes sear the air with unholy hues.

skillTree.name: Exalted Seeker Chariot
skillTree.description: Exalted Chariots are a blur of chromatic scythes and slicing blades pulled by Slaanesh's steeds.

skillTree.name: Supple & Spry
skillTree.description: This one’s writhing form can slowly caress and tease, but also move like lightning when required, knocking a projectile from the air or batting it back at the foe.

skillTree.name: Hates Khorne
skillTree.description: This obsession with murder is just cheap, mindless bloodlust of the basest kind. To the servants of Slaanesh, there's so much more to life… and to death too, of course.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Khornate factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Khornate factions

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Rapid Ruination
skillTree.description: Swift flashes of an agile form and razor-sharp blades are all this Daemon Lord's victims see of him, but by then it's already far, far too late.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma
skillTree.description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Smoke & Mirrors
skillTree.description: A conjured shadow is just as obfuscating as a real one - the Shadow Wizard is master or mistress of the 'concealing' arts.

skillTree.name: The Enfeebling Foe
skillTree.description: When cast, this spell enfeebles enemy minds; they feel the crushing weight of reality bearing down upon them.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "The Enfeebling Foe"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Enfeebling Foe Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Enfeebling Foe Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Withering
skillTree.description: The Wizard destroys their enemies from within, corroding foes' minds with doubt and crisis.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "The Withering"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Withering Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Withering Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Penumbral Pendulum
skillTree.description: A spectral pendulum is summoned by the Wizard. On command, it swings, razor sharp and with lethal speed, through the foe.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Penumbral Pendulum"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "The Penumbral Pendulum Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Penumbral Pendulum Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Pit of Shades
skillTree.description: The spellcaster opens a vortex leading into the Pit. Anything caught within it will be lost forever.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Pit of Shades"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Pit of Shades Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pit of Shades Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Okkam's Mindrazor
skillTree.description: The supernatural solution is often the best; weapons materialise before the caster's allies, allowing them to slice through flesh, soul, and consciousness.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Okkam's Mindrazor"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Okkam's Mindrazor Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Okkam's Mindrazor Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description: Greatly reduced chance of being detected while in ambush stance

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +10% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Sleek
backgroundSkills.description: This one's polished, perfectly glossy smoothness enables them to glide across land, sea or air, for they are truly favoured by the Dark Prince, and swift to do His bidding.

backgroundSkills.name: Depraver
backgroundSkills.description: Even the purest, most virtuous soul can be distorted to vile perversion or inveterate depravity if the right sort of temptation is offered.

backgroundSkills.name: Mystifying Miasma [HIDDEN]
backgroundSkills.description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

backgroundSkills.name: Graceful Discipline
backgroundSkills.description: It is not enough to seek victory in battle. True victory comes in mastery of the self - in mastering the art of waging war, of fighting perfectly in every way.

backgroundSkills.name: Overwhelm
backgroundSkills.description: Sickening beauty given flesh and sinew, the very incarnations of terror. Impurity will be removed from the world.

backgroundSkills.name: Lissome Grace
backgroundSkills.description: A Slaaneshi host on the warpath moves with unearthly grace, faster than sight and faster still than the bloody trails they leave.

backgroundSkills.name: Cruelty
backgroundSkills.description: A grand and intoxicating cruelty infects the host, seeking to perfect the first strike of each combat -as deadly, as exquisite, as slowly painful as possible.

backgroundSkills.name: Corroding Presence
backgroundSkills.description: The very presence of this servant of the Dark Prince is enough to weave a sickly taint into the very land around them, driving men to madness and debauchery.

effects.description:
Leadership: -2 for enemy units
	(enemy armies in local region)

backgroundSkills.name: High-Speed Incantation
backgroundSkills.description: Speeding through incantations with flawess diction and superhuman speed, each spell can be cast and the next chained into without a moment's pause.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.name: Divine Words
backgroundSkills.description: Fragments of ancient words - perhaps the tongue of the Old Ones, or Slaanesh's darkest secrets - writhe with unholy power, fueling the spells that steal them away.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells

backgroundSkills.name: Reaper of Souls
backgroundSkills.description: Dhar holds a certain appeal to those addicted to power, made all the worse by the Slaaneshi addiction to souls. Given the tools to sate their addiction, why would they hold back?

backgroundSkills.name: Storm of Steel
backgroundSkills.description: What began as a hobby - making a mockery of Dark Elven sorceresses - became genuine fascination with the endless torrent of phantasmal swords within the spell, striving to make each dance more beautifully than the last.

backgroundSkills.name: Third Impact
backgroundSkills.description: Little soothes the soul - or lack thereof - so much as the moment of horrified surprise upon a foe's face when they gaze upward and see their doom approaching.

backgroundSkills.name: Metalshifter
backgroundSkills.description: Dabbling into the magic of metal and gold has offered a pleasant departure from the norm, as well as new insights in how to augment the caster's army for even greater violence.

backgroundSkills.name: Spiteful Conjurer
backgroundSkills.description: Internalizing the vindictive cruelty of Dhar is easy for one seeped in such delectable emotions for time beyond measure, and they take great joy in inflicting it on others.

backgroundSkills.name: Bestial Surge
backgroundSkills.description: The Beastmen may be pathetic failures of the Dark Gods, yet something in their wild abandon resonates with this one.

backgroundSkills.name: Duelist
backgroundSkills.description: Few, even among the legions of the Prine of Excess, can claim to hold such dedication to the perfection of martial mastery.

backgroundSkills.name: Reaper
backgroundSkills.description: Deluding passivity rapidly gives way to unthinkable violence in the blink of an eye when the moment to strike arrives.

backgroundSkills.name: Slayer
backgroundSkills.description: No servant of Khorne, this one, yet their joyous love of battle may seem eerily similar to an outside eye.

backgroundSkills.name: Acrobat
backgroundSkills.description: Each movement perfectly calculated to avoid a blow, to unbalance a foe, to avoid harm. More importantly, a wondrous sight for all watching, beauty given form.
